participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Warm and nurturing, with a love for family and creativity.
participant_1.background: i have amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes. i am retired and living the great life.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Introverted and eccentric, with a passion for technology and gaming.
participant_2.background: i am a recluse. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am working on building a robot to be my body double. i helped design the game starcraft. i've an allergy to water.
